metadata.title: CVE-2020-11729 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in DAViCal Andrew's Web Libraries (AWL) through0.60. Long-term session cookies, uses to provide long-term sessioncontinuity, are not generated securely, enabling a brute-force attack thatmay be successful.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11729` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libawl-php - 0.61-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: awl package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.61-1').
